survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Gen Z employees regarding digital collaboration tools used in their workplaces.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital collaboration tools do you use most frequently in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the most commonly used tools among Gen Z employees. Consider adding an 'Other' option to capture tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox field type to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital collaboration tools do you use most frequently in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button field type.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a digital collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the key features that Gen Z employees prioritize in collaboration tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox field type to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a digital collaboration tool?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with the digital collaboration tools you use?
questions.client_notes: This question measures the frequency of technical issues, which can impact productivity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button field type.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with the digital collaboration tools you use?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools you currently use?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide detailed feedback on potential improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field type for this question.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools you currently use?
